TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE , GPE . The respondent Government are represented by PERSON , Agent , ORG and Law Enforcement .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
In DATE criminal investigations were instituted against the applicant and her accomplice on suspicion of aggravated fraud .
On DATE ORG preferred a bill of indictment against the applicant , charging her with aggravated fraud and forgery of documents .
On DATE ORG convicted the applicant .
On appeal , on DATE , ORG quashed the judgment .

In the resumed proceedings , on DATE ORG again convicted the applicant of the charges and sentenced her to DATE imprisonment , suspended for DATE , and ordered her to pay damages to the victim . The applicant appealed against this judgment .
On DATE ORG upheld in essence the first - instance judgment . This decision became final on that date .
On DATE the applicant ’s request for a retrial was rejected . Her appeals against this rejection were dismissed by ORG on DATE and by ORG on DATE .

Meanwhile , on DATE ORG rejected , without an examination on the merits , the applicant ’s petition for review as “ excluded by the law ” ( törvényben kizárt ) DATE and as such , inadmissible – since it was incompatible ratione materiae with the relevant provisions of LAW . Her repeated petition for review was rejected on DATE .
